title: Hastings & Hastings Reports That Personal Injury Cases Involving Accidents Are on the Rise
text:
Hastings & Hastings
Hastings & Hastings reports that the second quarter has yielded a rising number of personal injury cases specifically dealing with automobile accidents. Fortunately, Hastings & Hastings is well equipped to handle the rising demand sweeping through the second quarter.
PHOENIX , Aug. 19, A brief scan of their website reveals the many virtues of Hastings & Hastings that qualify them to meet the rising demand. They boast an impressive list of attorneys, some of whom have graduated cum laude and magna cum laude from ASU and U of A. What's more, they have an attorney who has served a clerkship at the Arizona State Supreme Court, and one whose alma mater is Columbia University , an Ivy League school in NYC.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150818/259295LOGO
"For over thirty-five years, we have been protecting individuals involved in automobile accidents. We have experienced partners and associates ready to handle the increasing needs of the valley," said David Hastings , founder of Hastings & Hastings.
Some of their work over the past 35 years include dealing with SUV accidents, truck accidents, car accidents, bicycle accidents, 18-wheeler trucking accidents, motorcycle collisions, and pedestrian accidents. If you are involved in such an accident, then you ought to reach out to Hastings & Hastings to help you recover the compensation you deserve.
Why? Six figure and even seven figure settlements are not uncommon. Exempli gratis , Hastings & Hastings has secured a $600,000 tire blow out settlement, a $2,000,000 wrongful death suit, a $200,000 drunk driver accident, and even a $190,000 go-cart accident. Automobile accidents can be emotionally debilitating, but that does not mean you need to undergo the process alone. An attorney will help ensure that you recover the damages you are entitled to, and make the process less painful.
No doubt Hastings & Hastings will continue to recover damages for the good people of Arizona's valley. With over eleven locations valley wide, a licensed attorney is just a call away. So, if you've been involved in a bicycle accident, car accident, pedestrian accident, 18-wheeler trucking accident, or motorcycle collision, then reach out to Hastings & Hastings.

Hastings & Hastings is an Arizona consumer law firm. We are an experienced trial law firm that represents personal injury and wrongful death victims at a Discount Fee.
